thread.title: Magda Iacob Cardoso
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Magda Iacob Cardoso

author: Magda Iacob Cardoso
title: Magda Iacob Cardoso
text: What can I say? I ordered a bouquet of flowers for next day delivery and the recipient never received it. They just ruined my day and my confidence in buying flowers online. Prestige Flowers blames the courier (and me), the courier is blaming the company for giving an incomplete address and the customer (me) still waiting for a refund mediated by PayPal. The customer service is there just to copy-paste random lines from T&C not to help in any way. Their greed is shameless really....
